BRaVa has 13 biobanks/cohorts to date! To join the collaboration, please [contact us](mailto:bravaconsortium@gmail.com).

<br>

<div class="well">

#### [The Avon Longitudial Study of Parents and Children (ALSPAC)](http://www.bristol.ac.uk/alspac/)

#### [BioBank Japan (BBJ)](https://biobankjp.org/en/)

#### [BioMe](https://icahn.mssm.edu/research/ipm/programs/biome-biobank)

#### [China Kadoorie Biobank (CKB)](https://www.ckbiobank.org/site/)

#### [Colorado Center for Precision Medicine (CCPM) Biobank](https://medschool.cuanschutz.edu/cobiobank)

#### [The Danish collaboration on Rare-Variants (DanRaV)](https://ikm.ku.dk)

#### [deCODE](https://www.decode.com/)

#### [Estonian Biobank](https://genomics.ut.ee/en/content/estonian-biobank)

#### [Genes and Health](https://www.genesandhealth.org/)

#### [Genomics England](https://www.genomicsengland.co.uk/)

#### [Mass General Brigham Biobank (MGBB)](https://biobank.massgeneralbrigham.org/)

#### [Million Women's Study](http://www.millionwomenstudy.org/introduction/)

#### [Penn Medicine BioBank](https://pmbb.med.upenn.edu/)

#### [Qatar Genome](https://www.qatargenome.org.qa/)

#### [UK Biobank](https://www.ukbiobank.ac.uk/)
</div>
